document_metadata.document_type: NOTICE OF APPEARANCE FOR SUBSTITUTE, ADDITIONAL, OR AMICUS COUNSEL

full_text:
Case 19-2221, Document 5, 07/24/2019, 2616528, Page1 of 1
NOTICE OF APPEARANCE FOR SUBSTITUTE, ADDITIONAL, OR AMICUS COUNSEL
Short Title: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein Docket No.: 19-2221
Substitute, Additional, or Amicus Counsel's Contact Information is as follows:
Name: Maurene Comey
Firm: United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
Address: One St. Andrew's Plaza
Telephone: (212) 637-2324 Fax: (212) 637-2387
E-mail: maurene.comey@usdoj.gov
Appearance for: United States of America/Appellee (party/designation)
Select One:
Substitute counsel (replacing lead counsel: ____________________ (name/firm)
Substitute counsel (replacing other counsel: ____________________ (name/firm)
Additional counsel (co-counsel with: Sarah K. Eddy/U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (name/firm)
Amicus (in support of : ____________________ (party/designation)
CERTIFICATION
I certify that:
I am admitted to practice in this Court and, if required by Interim Local Rule 46.1(a)(2), have renewed my admission on N/A OR
I applied for admission on ____________________.
Signature of Counsel: /s/Maurene Comey
Type or Print Name: Maurene Comey
DOJ-OGR-00000826

additional_notes: The document is a Notice of Appearance for Substitute, Additional, or Amicus Counsel in the case United States v. Jeffrey Epstein. It contains the contact information for Maurene Comey, who is appearing as additional counsel for the United States of America/Appellee. The document is signed by Maurene Comey and includes a certification that she is admitted to practice in the Court.
